code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Mouse=function Mouse(){useEffect(function(){var cursor=document.querySelector(".cursor");window.addEventListener("mousemove",function(e){cursor.style.top=e.y+"px";cursor.style.left=e.x+"px";});document.querySelectorAll(".hover").forEach(function(link){link.addEventListener("mouseover",function(){cursor.classList.add("hovered");});link.addEventListener("mouseleave",function(){cursor.style.transition=".3s ease-out";cursor.classList.remove("hovered");});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor"});};export default Mouse;
